oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Shadrick Maston Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Shadrick Lee, Co. E, 3rd Tenn. Inf., USA, of Oral, Tenn. near Lenoir City in Roane County, was captured near Love's Creek, near Knoxville, Tenn. on Jan. 25, 1864. He was sent to the prison camp at Andersonville, Ga. and paroled at Jacksonville, Fla. on April 28, 1865. The date on the photo "July 15, 1840 or 1842" refers to his birthdate. His death record lists his date of birth as July 19, 1841.
